name: Rage Quit (itch) (Meehaww)
description:
WSAD to move

LMB to shoot

MOUSE to aim

When you kill enemies you get time. If you get hit, you have to 'blow off steam' by playing a platformer game at your phone. When playing on the phone the timer will count down. If you manage to pick up the heart in time, you'll live. You can also find a power-up on every platformer level. Possible power-ups are damage (big bullet), shorter reload time (three bullets) or a shield.

I forgot to put this in the credits, but the TV shader was made by leon4aka from godotshaders.com
